Confound.card_desc: [Poison Bolts] Hitting an enemy with Poison Bolts reduces the cooldown of Smoke screen by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Dissipate.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Gain {scale=8|8}% Movement Speed for 2s when entering Smoke Screen.

Emergency Exit.card_desc: [Hidden] You automatically enter Stealth when you drop below 30% Health. This effect can happen once every {scale=25|-5}s.

Healing Vapors.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Grants {scale=100|100} Health over 2s when entering Smoke Screen.

Nimble Fingers.card_desc: [Poison Bolts] Activating Poison Bolts increases reload speed by {scale=10|10}% for 5s.

Ninja.card_desc: [Hidden] Gain {scale=5|5}% additional Movement Speed during Hidden.

Poisoner.card_desc: [Poison Bolts] Reduce the cooldown of Poison Bolts by {scale=1|1}s.

Quick Smoker.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Reduce the cooldown of Smoke Screen by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Shadow Affinity.card_desc: [Hidden] Reduce the cooldown of Hidden by {scale=1|1}s.

Slip Away.card_desc: [Armor] Gain {scale=3|3}% movement speed when Out of Combat.

Smoke and Dagger.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Smoke Screen now Heals allies inside it for 400 Health every 1s.

Specter.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Increase the duration of Smoke Screen by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Victory Rush.card_desc: [Weapon] Gain {scale=10|10}% Movement Speed for 8s after getting an elimination.

Aufl\u00f6sung.card_desc: [Nebelwand] Betrittst du die Nebelwand, erhöht sich dein Lauftempo 2s lang um {scale=8|8}%.

Entkr\u00e4ften.card_desc: [Giftbolzen] Nach Treffern mit Giftbolzen verbrauchst du {scale=0.6|0.6}s lang keine Munition.

Entwischen.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht dein Lauftempo außerhalb des Kampfes um {scale=3|3}%.

Flinke Finger.card_desc: [Giftbolzen] Die Aktivierung von Giftbolzen erhöht dein Nachladetempo 5s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Geschw\u00e4cht.card_desc: [Geschwächt] Giftbolzen verursacht 25% zusätzlichen Schaden und wirkt doppelt so schnell.

Gespenst.card_desc: [Nebelwand] Erhöht die Dauer von Nebelwand um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Giftmischung.card_desc: [Giftbolzen] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Giftbolzen um {scale=1|1}s.

Heilschwaden.card_desc: [Nebelwand] Betrittst du die Nebelwand, wirst du über 2s {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Nebelmaschine.card_desc: [Nebelwand] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Nebelwand um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Ninja.card_desc: [Verborgen] Erhöht dein Lauftempo während Verborgen um {scale=5|5}%.

Notausgang.card_desc: [Verborgen] Fällst du unter 30% deiner Gesundheit, wirst du automatisch getarnt. Nur einmal alle {scale=25|-5}s möglich.

Schattenaffinit\u00e4t.card_desc: [Verborgen] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Verborgen um {scale=1|1}s.

Siegesrausch.card_desc: [Waffe] Erhöht dein Lauftempo nach Eliminierungen 8s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Stich im Nebel.card_desc: [Nebelwand] Verbündete innerhalb der Nebelwand werden pro Sekunde 400 LP geheilt.

Verbl\u00fcffung.card_desc: [Giftbolzen] Treffer mit Giftbolzen reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Nebelwand um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Vorbereitung.card_desc: [Rüstung] Kills setzen alle Abklingzeiten zurück und du wirst um 500 LP geheilt.

Adresse.card_desc: [Carreaux empois.] Pendant 5s après Carreaux empoisonnés, votre vitesse de rechargement augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Affaiblissement.card_desc: [Affaiblissement] Les Carreaux empoisonnés infligent 25% de dégâts supplémentaires et agissent deux fois plus vite.

D\u00e9concert\u00e9.card_desc: [Carreaux empois.] Chaque Carreau empoisonné réussi réduit le temps de recharge d'Écran de fumée de {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

D\u00e9cr\u00e9pitude.card_desc: [Carreaux empoisonnés] Quand Carreaux empoisonnés touche un ennemi, vous ne consommez pas de munition pendant {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Dissipation.card_desc: [Écran de fumée] Passer dans l'Écran de fumée augmente votre vitesse de {scale=8|8}% pendant 2s.

\u00c9clipse.card_desc: [Armure] Votre vitesse hors combat augmente de {scale=3|3}%.

Empoisonneuse.card_desc: [Carreaux empois.] Les Carreaux empoisonnés se rechargent {scale=1|1}s plus vite.

Exhalaisons curatives.card_desc: [Écran de fumée] Les alliés à l'intérieur d'Écran de fumée regagnent 400 PV par seconde.

Fum\u00e9e envahissante.card_desc: [Écran de fumée] Écran de fumée se recharge {scale=0.6|0.6}s plus vite.

Inhalation.card_desc: [Écran de fumée] Passer dans l'Écran de fumée vous rend {scale=100|100} PV en 2s.

Ninja.card_desc: [Dissimulation] Dissimulation augmente votre vitesse de déplacement de {scale=5|5}%.

Pr\u00e9paration.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque exécution vous rend 500 PV et réinitialise les temps de recharge actifs.

Ru\u00e9e vers la gloire.card_desc: [Arme] Chaque élimination augmente votre vitesse de {scale=10|10}% pendant 8s.

Sortie de secours.card_desc: [Dissimulation] Passer en-dessous de 30% de PV vous rend invisible. Ne peut se produire qu'une fois toutes les {scale=25|-5}s.

Spectre.card_desc: [Écran de fumée] Écran de fumée dure {scale=0.6|0.6}s de plus.

\u6d88\u6563.card_desc: [烟雾弹] 在烟雾弹范围内获得{scale=10|10}%的移动速度加成，持续3秒

\u7075\u52a8.card_desc: [剧毒箭矢] 使用此技能后，你的装填速度提高{scale=10|10}%，持续5秒

\u7d27\u6025\u9003\u751f.card_desc: [隐身] 当生命值低于30%时你将自动进入隐身状态，这个效果每{scale=25|-5}秒只能触发一次

\u811a\u5e95\u62b9\u6cb9.card_desc: [护甲] 在非战斗状态下移动速度提高{scale=3|3}%

\u8870\u5f31\u6bd2\u836f.card_desc: [剧毒箭矢] 剧毒箭矢现在会造成30%额外伤害，且发作速度加倍。

\u8ff7\u60d1.card_desc: [剧毒箭矢] 剧毒箭矢每次命中敌人时，烟雾弹的冷却时间降低{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u96fe\u4e0e\u5200.card_desc: [烟雾弹] 烟雾弹会造成600点伤害

\u9884\u8c0b.card_desc: [护甲] 击败敌人时所有技能的冷却时间重置，且自身回复500点生命值

Cloak.card_desc: [Hidden] Hidden lasts 2s longer and removes you from combat.

Confound.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Enemies hit by Smoke Screen are Confused for 1.5s.

Decrepify.card_desc: [Poison Bolts] Your poison bolts reduce the target’s healing by {5/10/15/20}%

Dismantle.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Smoke Screen stuns Deployables for {2}s.

Emergency Exit.card_desc: [Hidden] You automatically enter Stealth when you drop below 30% Health. This effect can happen once every 40s.

Pollute.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Enemy pets and deployables inside of Smoke Screen are Stunned for 2s

Preparation.card_desc: [Armor] On successful kill or elimination, lower all your active Cooldowns by 25%

Shadow Affinity.card_desc: [Hidden] Reduce the cooldown of Hidden by 1s and you can mount while in stealth.

Smother.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Increase the duration and radius of smoke screen by 15%.

Specter.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Enter stealth that lasts 2s immediately upon entering your own Smoke Screen.

Surprise Attack.card_desc: [Hidden] Your first shot out of stealth applies a poison dealing 100 damage over 3s.

Tactical Reload.card_desc: [Weapon] Gain 3 max ammo count. Dealing a killing blow to a player instantly restores 5 ammo.

Crep\u00fasculo.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu cantidad de munición aumenta en {scale=2|2}.

Debilitar.card_desc: [Debilitar] Descarga venenosa ahora inflige un 25% más de daño el doble de rápido.

Decremento.card_desc: [Descarga venenosa] Si alcanza a un enemigo con Descarga venenosa, no consumirás munición durante {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Dedos \u00e1giles.card_desc: [Descarga venenosa] Al activarla, la Velocidad de recarga aumenta un {scale=10|10}% durante 5 s.

Diseminaci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Cortina de humo] Ganas {scale=8|8}% de velocidad de movimiento durante 2s al entrar en la Cortina de humo.

Envenenadora.card_desc: [Descarga venenosa] Reduces su recarga en {scale=1|1} s.

Esfumarse.card_desc: [Armadura] Ganas un {scale=3|3}% de velocidad de movimiento mientras estés fuera de combate.

Fumador raudo.card_desc: [Cortina de humo] La recarga de Cortina de humo se reduce en {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Humareda.card_desc: [Cortina de humo] Otorga {scale=100|100} PS por 2 s cuando entras en la Cortina de humo.

Humo y daga.card_desc: [Cortina de humo] Cortina de humo ahora cura a los aliados que estén en su interior 400 PS cada 1s.

Ninja.card_desc: [Ocultar] Consigues un {scale=5|5}% de velocidad de movimiento adicional mientras dure Ocultar.

Preparaci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Armadura] Al matar a un enemigo todas tus recargas se restablecen y te curas 500 PS.

Recarga t\u00e1ctica.card_desc: [Arma] Las eliminaciones te devuelven {scale=3|3} de munición.

Salida de emergencia.card_desc: [Ocultar] Entras en sigilo automáticamente cuando estás por debajo del 30% de salud. Puede activarse una vez cada {scale=25|-5}s.

Victoria adictiva.card_desc: [Arma] Ganas un {scale=10|10}% de velocidad de movimiento durante 8s tras una eliminación.

Afinidade Sombria.card_desc: [Escondida] Reduz o intervalo de Escondida em {scale=1|1}s.

Confundir.card_desc: [Dardos Tóxicos] Reduz o intervalo da Nuvem de Fumaça em {scale=0.5|0.5}s ao atingir um inimigo com os Dardos Tóxicos.

Debilitar.card_desc: [Debilitar] Os Dardos Tóxicos agora causam 25% mais dano, duas vezes mais rápido.

Dedos \u00c1geis.card_desc: [Dardos Tóxicos] Usar os Dardos Tóxicos aumenta a velocidade para recarregar sua arma em {scale=10|10}% por 5s.

Dissipar.card_desc: [Nuvem de Fumaça] Ganha {scale=8|8}% mais velocidade de movimento por 2s ao entrar na Nuvem de Fumaça.

Envenenado.card_desc: [Dardos Tóxicos] Acertar os Dardos Tóxicos faz você não consumir munição por {scale=0.6|0.6}s

Escapulir.card_desc: [Armadura] Ganha {scale=3|3}% mais velocidade de movimento quando estiver fora do combate.

Espectro.card_desc: [Nuvem de Fumaça] Aumenta duração da Nuvem de Fumaça em {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Fuma\u00e7a e Adaga.card_desc: [Nuvem de Fumaça] Nuvem de Fumaça agora cura os aliados dentro dela em 400 de vida por segundo.

Fuma\u00e7a R\u00e1pida.card_desc: [Nuvem de Fumaça] Reduz o intervalo da Nuvem de Fumaça em {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Ninja.card_desc: [Escondida] Aumenta em {scale=5|5}% a velocidade de movimento enquanto estiver Escondida.

Prepara\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Armadura] Matar um inimigo zera todos os intervalos e  cura em 500 de vida.

Sa\u00edda de Emerg\u00eancia.card_desc: [Escondida] Entra automaticamente em furtividade quando a vida cai abaixo de 30% . O efeito ocorre a cada {scale=25|-5}s.

Vapores Curativos.card_desc: [Nuvem de Fumaça] Concede {scale=100|100} de vida durante 2s ao entrar na Nuvem de Fumaça.

Velocidade da Vit\u00f3ria.card_desc: [Armadura] Recebe {scale=10|10}% mais velocidade de movimento por 8s após conseguir uma eliminação.

\u0410\u0432\u0430\u0440\u0438\u0439\u04.card_desc: [Незаметность] При уровне здоровья ниже 30% от максимального вы входите в режим скрытности. Можно использовать каждые {scale=25|-5} с.

\u0411\u044b\u0441\u0442\u0440\u044b\u04.card_desc: [Дымовая завеса] Перезарядка Дымовой завесы сокращается на {scale=0.6|0.6} с.

\u0414\u044b\u043c \u0438 \u043a\u0438\u.card_desc: [Дымовая завеса] Дымовая завеса каждую секунду исцеляет находящихся в ней союзников на 400 ед.

\u0417\u0430\u043c\u0435\u0448\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Ядовитые стрелы] Попадание по врагу Ядовитыми стрелами сокращает перезарядку Дымовой завесы на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u0418\u0437\u043d\u0443\u0440\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Изнурение] Ядовитые стрелы теперь наносят на 25% больше урона в два раза быстрее.

\u0418\u0441\u0446\u0435\u043b\u044f\u04.card_desc: [Дымовая завеса] Попадание в Дымовую завесу дает {scale=100|100} ед. здоровья в течение 2 с.

\u041b\u043e\u0432\u043a\u0438\u0435 \u0.card_desc: [Ядовитые стрелы] Активация Ядовитых стрел увеличивает скорость перезарядки на {scale=10|10}% на 5 с.

\u041d\u0438\u043d\u0434\u0437\u044f.card_desc: [Незаметность] Скорость передвижения во время действия Незаметности увеличивается на {scale=5|5}%.

\u041e\u0434\u0440\u044f\u0445\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Ядовитые стрелы] При попаданиях Ядовитыми стрелами вы не расходуете боеприпасы в течение {scale=0.6|0.6} с.

\u041e\u0442\u0440\u0430\u0432\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Ядовитые стрелы] Перезарядка Ядовитых стрел сокращается на {scale=1|1} с.

\u041f\u043e\u0434\u0433\u043e\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Убийства перезаряжают ваши способности и исцеляют вас на 500 ед.

\u041f\u0440\u0438\u0432\u0438\u0434\u04.card_desc: [Дымовая завеса] Длительность Дымовой завесы увеличивается на {scale=0.6|0.6} с.

\u0420\u0430\u0441\u0441\u0435\u044f\u04.card_desc: [Дымовая завеса] Попадание в Дымовую завесу увеличивает скорость передвижения на {scale=8|8}% на 2 с.

\u0423\u0441\u043a\u043e\u043b\u044c\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваша скорость передвижения увеличивается на {scale=3|3}%, когда вы находитесь вне боя.

\u042d\u0439\u0444\u043e\u0440\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Устранения увеличивают скорость передвижения на {scale=10|10}% на 8 с.

Dym i sztylet.card_desc: [Zasłona dymna] Zasłona dymna przywraca znajdującym się w niej sojusznikom 400 PZ co 1 s.

Lecznicze wyziewy.card_desc: [Zasłona dymna] Przyznaje {scale=100|100} PZ na 2 s po wejściu w Zasłonę dymną.

Ninja.card_desc: [Ukrycie] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=5|5}% w trakcie trwania Ukrycia.

Os\u0142abienie.card_desc: [Osłabienie] Zatrute bełty zadają teraz o 25% więcej obrażeń dwa razy szybciej.

Prze\u015blizgni\u0119cie.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=3|3}%, gdy jesteś poza walką.

Przygotowania.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zabicie wroga resetuje wszystkie czasy odnowienia i przywraca 500 PZ.

Rozpad.card_desc: [Zatrute bełty] Celne trafienia Zatrutym bełtem wstrzymują zużywanie amunicji na {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Roztrwonienie.card_desc: [Zasłona dymna] Przyznaje {scale=8|8}% szybkości ruchu na 2 s po wejściu w Zasłonę dymną.

Szybka zadymka.card_desc: [Zasłona dymna] Skraca czas odnowienia Zasłony dymnej o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Trucicielka.card_desc: [Zatrute bełty] Skraca czas odnowienia Zatrutych bełtów o {scale=1|1} s.

Wsp\u00f3lnota cienia.card_desc: [Ukrycie] Skraca czas odnowienia Ukrycia o {scale=1|1} s.

Wyj\u015bcie awaryjne.card_desc: [Ukrycie] Gdy poziom twego zdrowia spadnie poniżej 30%, automatycznie wejdziesz w tryb ukrycia. Efekt ten może wystąpić raz na {scale=25|-5} s.

Zjawa.card_desc: [Zasłona dymna] Wydłuża czas trwania Zasłony dymnej o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Zmieszanie.card_desc: [Zatrute bełty] Trafienie wroga Zatrutymi bełtami skraca czas odnowienia Zasłony dymnej o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Zr\u0119czne palce.card_desc: [Zatrute bełty] Użycie Zatrutych bełtów zwiększa szybkość przeładowania o {scale=10|10}% na 5 s.

Zwyci\u0119ski p\u0119d.card_desc: [Broń] Udana eliminacja zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na 8 s.

Acil \u00c7\u0131k\u0131\u015f.card_desc: [Gizli] %30 Canın altına düştüğün zaman otomatik olarak Gizlenme'ye girersin. Bu etki her {scale=25|-5} saniyede bir gerçekleşebilir.

\u00c7evik Parmaklar.card_desc: [Zehirli Oklar] Zehirli Oklar etkinleştirildiğinde Yeniden Doldurma Hızı 5 sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} artar.

Da\u011f\u0131lma.card_desc: [Sis Perdesi] Sis Perdesi'ne girince 2 sn boyunca %{scale=8|8} Hareket Hızı kazan.

Dermans\u0131z.card_desc: [Zehirli Ok] Zehirli Oklar isabet ederse {scale=0.6|0.6} sn boyunca cephane harcamazsın.

Duman ve Han\u00e7er.card_desc: [Sis Perdesi] Sis Perdesi içindeki müttefikler her saniye 400 Can iyileşir.

Haz\u0131rl\u0131k.card_desc: [Zırh] Bir düşmanı katletmek tüm Bekleme Sürelerini sıfırlar ve seni 500 Can iyileştirir.

H\u0131zl\u0131 T\u00fctt\u00fcr\u00fcc\.card_desc: [Sis Perdesi] Sis Perdesi'nin bekleme süresini {scale=0.6|0.6} sn azalt.

\u0130yile\u015ftiren Buharlar.card_desc: [Sis Perdesi] Sis Perdesi'ne girdiğinde 2 saniyede {scale=100|100} Can kazanırsın.

Kafa Kar\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.card_desc: [Zehirli Oklar] Bir düşmanı Zehirli Oklar ile vurmak, Sis Perdesi'nin Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5} sn azaltır.

Ninja.card_desc: [Gizli] Gizli esnasında %{scale=5|5} ek Hareket Hızı kazan.

Ruh Gibi.card_desc: [Sis Perdesi] Sis Perdesi'nin süresini {scale=0.6|0.6} sn artır.

Zafer Ko\u015fusu.card_desc: [Silah] Bir saf dışı bırakma yaptıktan sonra 8 sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} Hareket Hızı kazan.

Zay\u0131flat.card_desc: [Zayıflat] Zehirli Oklar artık iki kat hızlı olarak %25 daha fazla hasar veriyor.

Zehirleyici.card_desc: [Zehirli Oklar] Zehirli Oklar'ın Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1} sn azalt.
